DataElement.preferredName: Image Plane Image Location X-Coordinate ISO21090.REAL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The position and orientation of the image slice relative to the patient-based coordinate system._Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:A position, site, or point in space where something can be found.:A horizontal coordinate that is used together with a vertical coordinate to specify an exact point in space._Fractional numbers represented by decimals.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
